item.title: Is GO good at Math?
item.description: We don't usually associate GO with a language to do mathematics, geometry or deep learning. Those tasks are usually left mainly to Python. But is GO good at math as well? Let's try and explore the implementation of few simple mathematical problems using GO. Pre-requisite To implement our code we will use gonum, which is a GO library for numerical and scientific algorithms. As a plus, it has nice plotting functions as well.
